subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Just as when they played as children on the reserve in Six Nations, Ontario, two old friends, Cody Jamieson and Sid Smith, stole the show as Syracuse beat Cornell in the Division I men’s lacrosse final.
snippet: Just as when they played as children on the reserve in Six Nations, Ontario, two old friends, Cody Jamieson and Sid Smith, stole the show as Syracuse beat Cornell in the Division I men’s lacrosse final.
